transcripts.text: High on the mountaintop, I had a vision of horses and demons.  Kitchy Mormon heaven dreaming, I woke up in the morning drenched in sweat and screaming, Mother forgive me, Mother forgive me.  I am a witness, I am a witness.  Who is a witness, who is a witness?  Mother forgive me.

A flag unfurled on a mountaintop.

A rippling shock to my small town.  Like shocker when my walls came down.  Make it stop.  Please make it stop.  I want to think somebody saw me.  I need to know somebody's watching.
